title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Time and Time of Poll) Order, 2021
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 35
Gazette dated Friday, 29th Januar y, 2021
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
Statutory Instrument No. 7 of 2021
The Electoral Process Act
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2021
In exercise of the powers contained in section 125 of the Electoral
Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Time and Time of Poll) Order,
2021.
2. A candidate for election of as council chairperson or councilor Date and
in a district or ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination time of
nominations
with the Returning Officer on Thursday, 14th January, 2021, for elections
between 0900 hours and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 14th Campaign
January, 2021, at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours on Wednesday, period
3rd February, 2021.
4. (1) The poll for the election of a council chairperson or Election date
councillor in a district or ward set out in the Schedule shall take and time of
poll
place on Thursday, 4th February, 2021, between 0600 hours and
1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district or ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of /his Statutory Instrument can be obtainedfrom the Government Printer.
P.O. Box 30136. 10101. Lusaka. Price K4.00 each
36 Statutory Instruments 25th January, 2021
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs 2 and 4)
Elections for Council. Chairpaerson
Province District
Eastern Vubwi
Elections for Council Councillors
District Constituency Ward No. Name
Masaiti Masaiti 102007017 Miputu
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this 20th day of January, 2021.
Justice E. E. Chulu,
Chairperson
E. J. SlKAZWE,
Member
A. D. Simwinga,
Member
V. Mukando,
Member
N. M. Mutiti,
Lusaka Member
20th January, 2021
[ec/1 01/5/5 conf.]
